EmailTemplate.subject: Experience the Power of VMTurbo | Schedule Your Complimentary Demo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
SCHEDULE YOUR FREE DEMO. Experience the Power of VMTurbo.
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, You licensed your 30-Day instance of VMTurbo Operations Manager 2 weeks ago, and we hope they have been blissful. Let us make the remaining 2 weeks unbelievable.
Request a live demo now, and we will accommodate any date and time that suits your schedule <http://bit.ly/1wkElmq>. A VMTurbo engineer will be present on your demo call to show you specific ways to fully leverage the power of VMTurbo, and can provide you with a license key to any of our control module extensions:
- Application Control Module <http://bit.ly/1tOO427> - Capacity Planner <http://bit.ly/1knaYep> - Fabric Control Module <http://bit.ly/1nubWZe> - Hybrid Cloud Control Module <http://bit.ly/1nAF9zq> - Storage Control Module <http://bit.ly/TTnEjc>
Your IT control system, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
